feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-23T13:56:20.704320Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;抗量子计算密码算法的 Java 实现</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mthiim/dilithium-java</id>; <updated>;2023-10 -23T12：55：39.788402Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/mthiim/dilithium-java”/>; <作者>; <名称>;系泊物</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/f2f44b6e0d4d5ca9e14a5889237a9fdfcb039da295590915851a2c777f6d2f4c/mthiim/dilithium-java"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；” />;<br />;这是 Dilithium 的 Java 实现，Dilithium 是一种抗量子密码算法。它基于 C 参考实现和文档，并已包装到 JCE 提供程序中以方便使用。 Dilithium 是 CRYSTALS 算法套件的一部分，基于代数格。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#java-implementation-of-a-quantum-computing-pressive-cryptography-algorithm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37984404" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Protomaps – 自由开源的世界地图</stitle>; <id>;https://protomaps.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T07:55:39.791030Z</更新>; <link href="https://protomaps.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Protomaps 是一个开源世界地图，可以作为单个静态文件部署在云存储上。它为 Leaflet 和 MapLibre GL 等地图库提供一流的支持，并且可以将地图费用从每月数百美元减少到几美分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#protomaps-a-free-and-open-source-map-of-the-world" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37982621" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建运行 WebAssembly 的 unikernel – 第 1 部分</stitle>; <id>;https://flavio.castelli.me/2023/02 /07/building-a-unikernel-that-runs-web assembly---part-1/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T06:55:39.791475Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /flavio.castelli.me/2023/02/07/building-a-unikernel-that-runs-webassemble---part-1/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;walterbell</名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://flavio.castelli.me/images/unikernel-web assembly/ demo.gif" style="宽度：220px；高度：135px；" />;<br />;Hackweek 22 于上周举行，期间 SUSE 员工可以自由地从事自己的项目。作者决定将他们的博客文章分成更小的部分，目的是探索 unikernels 和 WebAssembly 的结合。他们发现，针对 WebAssembly 平台为应用程序提供了明确的功能，允许它们在不同的运行时上运行，而无需开发人员进行额外的工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-unikernel-that-runs-web assembly-part-1" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37982137" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Base64 编码，解释</stitle>; <id>;https://www.akshaykhot.com/base64-encoding-explained/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T05:55:39.791945Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.akshaykhot.com/base64-encoding-explained/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;software_writer</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=software_writer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.akshaykhot.com/content /images/2023/10/base64_encoding.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：144px；" />;<br />;Base64 编码将二进制数据转换为文本，特别是 ASCII 文本。它使用特定的、精简的字符集对二进制数据进行编码，以防止数据损坏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#base64-encoding-explained" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37981939" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;丰田接近量产固态电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ft.com/content/6224f235-568c-4e2f-8247-e7dacf0ef20c</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T12:55:39.792338Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.ft.com/content/6224f235-568c-4e2f-8247-e7dacf0ef20c"/>; <作者>; <名称>; bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www. ft.com/__assets/creatives/product/dynamic-barriers/energy.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：134px；" />;<br />;尝试完全数字化访问，看看为什么有超过 100 万读者订阅《金融时报》。继续阅读 4 周 1 美元，然后每月 69 美元。试用期间，您将拥有对 FT.com 的完整数字访问权限，其中包含标准数字和高级数字套餐中的所有内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toyota-nears-mass-product-of-solid-state-batteries" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37984838" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;冷却器屏幕</stitle>; <id>;https://computer.rip/2023-10-22-cooler-screens.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T06:55:39.793169Z</更新>; <link href="https://computer.rip/2023-10-22-cooler-screens.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kevincox </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kevincox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;数字广告媒体 The Cooler Screens 已安装在沃尔格林商店没有太多促销。这些屏幕显示冷藏箱内产品的图像，并收集消费者互动的数据。然而，他们面临着屏幕冻结、显示不正确和安全问题等问题。这些屏幕还因性能和可靠性差而受到批评。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cooler-screens" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37982149" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Shopify 就非法 DMCA 删除滥用提起诉讼</stitle>; <id>;https://torrentfreak.com/shopify-files-lawsuit-over-illegal-dmca-takedown-abuse-231020/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T09:55:39.793562Z</更新>; <link href="https://torrentfreak.com/shopify-files-lawsuit-over-illegal-dmca-takedown-abuse-231020/"/ >; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Shopify 已提交针对非法 DMCA 删除滥用行为的诉讼。该电子商务平台受到一系列虚假 DMCA 请求的攻击，这些请求被用来骚扰 Shopify 及其商家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#shopify-files-lawsuit-over-illegal-dmca-takedown-abuse" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37983386" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;微软修复了破坏科学数据的 Excel 功能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/21/ 23926585/microsoft-excel-misreading-dates-human-genes-conversion-fixed</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T12:55:39.793947Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge .com/2023/10/21/23926585/microsoft-excel-misreading-dates- human-genes-conversion-fixed"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x1600 /filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24007866/acastro_STK109_microsoft_02.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Excel 中的一项新设置使用户可以控制自动数据转换功能，该功能迫使科学家重新设计代表人类基因的符号。Microsoft 正在推出更新来解决此问题。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-fixes-the-excel-feature-that-was-wrecking-scientific-data” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37984566" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;地球在 20 年前就停止变得更加环保了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/earth-stopped-getting-greener -20-years-ago/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T11:55:39.794329Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/earth-stopped-getting -greener-20-years-ago/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Podgajski</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Podgajski</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://static.scientificamerican.com/sciam/cache/file/3914D19B-BE63-4544-ABA8870574834BCF_source.jpeg?w=590&h=800&D1EF4582-63F6-4373-8160E94B7C4799D5”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 299px;" />;<br />;世界正逐渐变得不那么绿化，由于气候变化导致空气中的水分减少，植物生长下降。卫星观测显示，直到大约20年前，全球植被还在扩张，但从那时起，世界上一半以上的植被景观出现了植物生长减少的情况。这种下降与大气湿度日益不足有关，预计随着世界变暖，这种情况将继续增加。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#earth-stopped-getting-greener-20-years-ago" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=37984382" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;展示 HN：Pypipe – 用于管道处理的 Python 命令行工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bugen/pypipe</id>; <更新>;2023-10 -23T04:55:39.794716Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/bugen/pypipe"/>; <author>; <name>;bugen</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=bugen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/9184f811c31db81e039dc9262815727d1c644acf47987a470280b623bff90d71/bugen/pypipe" style="width ：220像素； height: 110px;" />;<br />;Pypipe 是一个用于管道处理的 Python 命令行工具。它是一个仅使用标准库的单个 Python 文件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#show-hn-pypipe-a-python-command-line-tool-for-pipeline-processing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37981683" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;最低15%的全球企业税漏洞太多</stitle>; <id>;https://fortune.com/2023/10/23/minimum-15-global-corporate-tax-漏洞-生成-半收入-预期-欧盟税-观察站/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T11:55:39.795101Z</更新>; <link href="https://fortune.com/ 2023/10/23/minimum-15-global-corporate-tax-loopholes-generate-half-revenue-expected-eu-tax-observatory/"/>; <author>; <name>;DocFeind</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DocFeind</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://content.fortune.com/wp-content/uploads /2023/10/AP23293610026780-e1698051083271.jpg?w=1440&q=75" style="宽度: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;140多个国家和地区在2021年达成了一项雄心勃勃的协议，旨在清除避税天堂并迫使跨国公司缴纳最低税款，但该协议因漏洞而被削弱，并且只能筹集一小部分收入欧盟支持的税务监管机构警告称，这是设想的。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minimum-15-global-corporate-tax-has-too-many-loopholes"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37984224" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;卢卡斯影业《栖息地》的教训 (1990)</stitle>; <id>;https ://web.stanford.edu/class/history34q/readings/Virtual_Worlds/LucasfilmHabitat.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-22T18:55:39.795483Z</更新>; <link href="https:// web.stanford.edu/class/history34q/readings/Virtual_Worlds/LucasfilmHabitat.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kuba-orlik</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= kuba-orlik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.stanford.edu/class/history34q/readings/Virtual_Worlds/lessonshabitat.gif" style="width ：220像素； height: 165px;" />;<br />;卢卡斯影业的 Habitat 是创建大型商业多用户虚拟环境的首批尝试之一。它为用户提供了在线模拟世界的实时动画视图，他们可以在其中沟通、玩游戏和参与各种活动。从开发和管理 Habitat 中汲取的经验教训为未来的网络空间架构师提供了宝贵的见解。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-lessons-of-lucasfilm -s-habitat-1990" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37977632" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;女子赢得长达 12 年的法律诉讼谷歌</stitle>; <id>;https://www.abc.net.au/news/2023-10-23/janice-duffy-wins-12-year-legal-battle-against-google/103008954</id >; <更新>;2023-10-23T10:55:39.795875Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.abc.net.au/news/2023-10-23/janice-duffy-wins-12 -year-legal-battle-against-google/103008954"/>; <作者>; <名称>;除霜</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=defrost</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://live-products.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/a823e832320f52ddc973a494fe72ef92?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1080&cropW=1920&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=485 “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;一名阿德莱德妇女在与谷歌达成秘密和解后，结束了与谷歌长达 12 年的法律斗争。Janice Duffy 博士成功辩称谷歌在其搜索引擎上发布了一个网站的诽谤性摘录尽管她请求删除页面。这是她第二次收到该公司的损害赔偿。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#woman-wins-12-year-legal-battle-against -google" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37983903" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟聊天控制法案推迟</stitle>; <id>; https://tutanota.com/blog/chat-c​​ontrol-criticism</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T07:55:39.796251Z</更新>; <link href="https://tutanota.com/blog /chat-c​​ontrol-criticism"/>; <作者>; <名称>;BramLovesYams</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BramLovesYams</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= “html”>; <img src =“https://tutanota.com/blog/images/eu-flag.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 122px;" />;<br />;欧盟成员国理事会推迟了原定于 10 月 19 日举行的《儿童性虐待条例》(CSAR) 最终投票，这已是第二次推迟。欧盟国家根本无法就这项备受争议的草案达成一致，即使欧盟成员国最终达成协议，也需要在欧盟议会进行讨论。这是一个很好的迹象，表明该法规（也称为聊天控制）和有史以来最受批评的欧盟法律之一可能会失败。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-chat-c​​ontrol-bill-postponed" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37982655" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;国家家庭食品保存中心</stitle>; <id>;https://nchfp.uga.edu/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T01:55:39.796628Z</更新>; <link href="https://nchfp.uga.edu/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;朱古塔</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Jugurtha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nchfp.uga.edu/images/hero-home .jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;国家家庭食品保存中心是基于研究的家庭食品保存建议的可靠来源。它提供各种保存方法的信息并解决食品安全问题。该中心提供资源适合初学者，并强调正确包装和储存的重要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#national-center-for-home-food-preservation" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37980626" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;与人类一起捕猎的虎鲸可能已经灭绝</stitle>; <id>;https://www.livescience.com/动物/orcas-that-hunted-alongside-humans-might-be-extinct</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T09:55:39.797024Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.livescience .com/animals/orcas-that-hunted-alongside- humans-might-be-extinct"/>; <author>; <name>;aforelight</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =aforelight</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/hgqiAea73xyUNSuyHo4QXg-320-80.jpg" style="width: 220 像素；高度：124px;" />;<br />;根据基因分析，与澳大利亚土著捕鲸者和欧洲捕鲸者一起捕猎的虎鲸种群似乎已经灭绝。虎鲸与捕鲸者有着互惠互利的关系，称为“法则”舌头的”。一头名为“老汤姆”的 23 英尺长虎鲸的 DNA 表明，这种捕鲸种群现已灭绝。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#orcas-that -hunted-alongside- humans-might-be-extinct" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37983349" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;声网时钟</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tindie.com/products/dadantech/agora-clock-v2/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T05:55:39.797405Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.tindie.com/products/dadantech/agora-clock-v2/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Bondi_Blue</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=Bondi_Blue</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.tindiemedia.com/images/resize/MAz649ezflQ2_bKY1q6lUDMKhgU=/p/fit-in/1032x688 /filters:fill(fff)/i/388921/products/2020-01-13T20%3A07%3A26.858Z-IMG_6172.jpg?1606306133" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Agora Clock 是一款带有电子纸显示屏的简约座钟。在广角和各种光线条件下都具有出色的可读性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#agora-clock" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37981925" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亿万富翁应该面临最低税率，报告称</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/business-67191791</id>; <updated>;2023-10-23T13:07:39.797787Z</updated>; <link href= "https://www.bbc.com/news/business-67191791"/>; <作者>; <名称>;adrian_mrd</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adrian_mrd</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/774C/product/_131504503_blokewithmoney.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：124px;" />;<br />;一份报告显示，亿万富翁应该面临最低税率，该报告发现世界上一些超级富豪几乎不缴税，甚至不缴税。欧盟税务观察站表示，大多数人缴纳的税率较高据称，超级富豪能够利用复杂的业务结构来避税。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#billionaires-should-face-a-minimum-tax-rate -report-says" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37985062" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;3.5 英寸软盘的起源 [视频] </stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=djsyVgTGaRk</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T02:55:39.798175Z</更新>; <link href="https: //www.youtube.com/watch?v=djsyVgTGaRk"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zdw</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; < /author>; <content type=“html”>;<iframe src=“//www.youtube.com/embed/djsyVgTGaRk”frameborder=“0”allowfullscreen=“lazy”>;</iframe>; <a href=“https” ://hackernews.betacat.io/#origins-of-the-3-5in-floppy-disk-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37971648" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Raspberry Pi 5：现已上市</stitle>; <id>;https://www.raspberrypi.com/news/raspberry-pi-5-available-now/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T08:55:39.798550Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.raspberrypi.com/news/raspberry-pi-5-available-now/"/>; <作者>; <name>;avyeed_desa</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=avyeed_desa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /www.raspberrypi.com/app/uploads/2023/10/RPi-5-Featured-Product-copy-1024x649.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 140px;" />;<br />;最新一代旗舰产品 Raspberry Pi 5 将于本周开始向客户发货。目标是完成所有缺货订单，并在所有认可经销商处备有 Raspberry Pi 的库存年底。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#raspberry-pi-5-available-now" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37982948" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Excel 将允许关闭某些自动数据转换</stitle>; <id>;https://insider.microsoft365.com/en-us/blog /control-data-conversions-in-excel-for-windows-and-mac</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T05:55:39.798927Z</更新>; <link href="https://insider. microsoft365.com/en-us/blog/control-data-conversions-in-excel-for-windows-and-mac"/>; <作者>; <名称>;xnhbx </名称>; <uri>;https://news.microsoft365.com/en-us/blog/control-data-conversions-in-excel-for-windows-and-mac"/>; ycombinator.com/user?id=xnhbx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://office-insider-media.azurefd.net/media/2020/06/博客英雄-女人-工作在厨房-VP1-539-x-440.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 180px;" />;<br />;Microsoft 根据用户反馈改进了 Excel 中的自动数据转换设置。用户现在可以通过更改 Excel 的默认行为来禁用特定类型的自动数据转换。<a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#excel-will-allow-certain-auto-data-conversions-to-be-turned-off" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37982049" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在藻类、蜗牛和其他生物体中发现了数千个可编程 DNA 切割器</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-10-数千-programmable-dna-cutters-algae-snails.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T03:55:39.799310Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023 -10-thousands-programmable-dna-cutters-algae-snails.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2018/amoeba.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;麻省理工学院麦戈文脑研究所的科学家们在多种物种中发现了数千种名为 Fanzors 的可编程 DNA 切割酶，包括蜗牛、藻类和阿米巴原虫。这些 RNA 引导的酶可以通过编程在特定位点切割 DNA，为研究和医学提供一套新的可编程酶。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thousands-of-programmable-dna-cutters-found- in-algae-snails-and-other-organisms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37981109" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rivian R1T 是第一辆赢得美国最长越野比赛的电动汽车</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/22/rivian-r1t-is-the-first-ev-to-win -the-longest-off-road-competition-in-the-us/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T00:55:39.799691Z</更新>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com /2023/10/22/rivian-r1t-is-the-first-ev-to-win the the-longest-off-road-competition-in-the-us/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dkobia< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dkobia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/ wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rivian-rebelle.jpg?w=600" style="width: 220px;高度： 147px;" />;<br />;Rivian R1T 成为第一辆赢得 Rebelle 拉力赛的电动汽车，这是美国最长的越野地图和指南针拉力赛。驾驶 R1T 的全女性车队参赛4x4 组第一名。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rivian-r1t-is-the-first-ev-to-win-the-longest-off-road-competition-in -the-us" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37980323" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;埃德加·爱伦·坡的美国</stitle>; <id >;https://www.bunkhistory.org/resources/edgar-allan-poes-america</id>; <更新>;2023-10-23T00:55:39.800069Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.bunkhistory.org/resources/edgar-allan-poes-america"/>; <作者>; <名称>;benbreen</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.bunkhistory.org/derivatives/rectangle_super/images/2023-10-02/$2y$10$ M14DLbnQYyqsOxfpRPhqJ.lAmmRVAXU2cPiB0ALkWVjjd69kyA70q/Edgar_Allan_Poe_National_Historic_Site_bb888c.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：147px;" />;<br />;埃德加·爱伦·坡在他的 40 年里生活过 35 个不同的地址，从未真正属于任何地方。他的小说和诗歌几乎没有提到美国的任何地方，而是让人想起旧世界的地方，并狂热尽管爱伦·坡没有永久的家，但他经常被认为是世界各地和几代人中最有影响力的美国作家。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#edgar-allan-poe -s-america" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37968559" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一位荷兰图形艺术家以 3D 方式重建了特诺奇蒂特兰城</ stitle>; <id>;https://tenochtitlan.thomaskole.nl/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-22T13:55:39.800455Z</更新>; <link href="https://tenochtitlan.stitle" thomaskole.nl/index.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;GuardianCaveman</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=GuardianCaveman</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://tenochtitlan.thomaskole.nl/image_dest/cover_hirez_hd.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：90px;" />;<br />;墨西哥特诺奇蒂特兰是阿兹特克帝国的首都，是一座繁华的大都市，人口超过 500 万。一位图形艺术家利用历史和考古资料，以 3D 方式重建了这座城市，将其变为现实。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-dutch-graphic-artist-reconstructed-tenochtitlan-in-3d" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37973229" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何制作 CPU – 基于图片的简单说明</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.robertelder.org /how-to-make-a-cpu/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-22T16:55:39.800833Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.robertelder.org/how-to -make-a-cpu/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;应计</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=accrual</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://blog.robertelder.org/how-to-make-a-cpu/1-rock_600x338_q70.jpeg" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文的目的是在不使用太多文字的情况下，尽可能快地解释如何用石头和沙子制作CPU。它强调了个人能够制作东西的重要性在一个由专有硬件和软件主导的世界中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-make-a-cpu-a-simple-picture-based-explanation" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37976894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ruffle：Flash Player 模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://ruffle .rs/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-22T22:55:39.801223Z</更新>; <link href="https://ruffle.rs/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rapnie</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rapnie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ruffle.rs/assets/ undraw_design_components.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Ruffle 是一个用 Rust 编写的 Flash Player 模拟器。它通过 WebAssembly 在所有现代操作系统和浏览器上本机运行，提供了一种安全可靠的方式来运行 Flash 内容。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ruffle-flash-player-emulator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37965947" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text">;如何制作你自己的怪异魔眼图片（自动立体图）</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.demofox.org/2023/10/22/how-to-make-your-own-spooky -magic-eye-pictures-autostereograms/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-22T18:55:39.801606Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.demofox.org/2023/10/22 /how-to-make-your-own-spooky-magic-eye-pictures-autostereograms/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jstanley</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=jstanley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://demofox2.files.wordpress.com/2023/10/grave_color_pumpkins.png?w=608" style= “宽度：220px； height: 174px;" />;<br />;To make an autostereogram, you need a color image and a depth image. The depth image defines the 3D shape, and the color image is tiled to create the output image. By modifying the algorithm and looking at the output image at an offset location, a 3D effect can be achieved. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-make-your-own-spooky-magic-eye-pictures-autostereograms" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37977938" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Stealing OAuth tokens of Microsoft accounts via open redirect in Harvest App</stitle>; <id>;https://eval.blog/research/microsoft-account-token-leaks-in-harvest/</id>; <updated>;2023-10-22T13:55:39.801981Z</updated>; <link href="https://eval.blog/research/microsoft-account-token-leaks-in-harvest/"/>; <author>; <name>;skilled</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skilled</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1691553710865/484c5af8-4152-4d19-9baf-ec600b2e38f0.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 106px;" />;<br />;Harvest, a time-tracking software, had an open redirect vulnerability that allowed for the leaking of Microsoft Account's OAuth tokens. The vulnerability was acknowledged by the company but took a long time to fix. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stealing-oauth-tokens-of-microsoft-accounts-via-open-redirect-in-harvest-app" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37973937" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
